item.title: The Loremaster
item.description:
Bug dolu quest’ler, Ã§alÄ±ÅŸmayan script’ler, iÅŸe yaramayan Ã§Ã¶p quest gear’Ä±, 2005 yÄ±lÄ±ndan beri kÄ±yÄ±da kÃ¶ÅŸede kalmÄ±ÅŸ unutulmuÅŸ hikayeler…Ve sonunda World of Warcraft -The Loremaster- achievement’Ä±…

I am the bone of loremaster.
Quest book is my body, and lore is my blood.
I have completed over a thousand quests.
Unknown to death.
Nor known to life.
Have withstood pain to complete so many quests.
Yet, those hands will never achieve anything.
So as I pray, “Unlimited Quest Works.” ðŸ”—
